name: Perfect Potato Gratin

ingredients.name: thyme or dill, if not fresh use half the amount

steps: Peel and dice into medium sized cubes, place in cold water until. Peel and slice potatoes evenly and thinly into a large mixing bowl. Don't cook potatoes.
Add cream and egg. Mix first in bowl then add potatoes; toss to combine to ensure even coating.
Add herb of choice, dill or thyme
Season lightly with salt and pepper to taste.
Place potatoes in a baking dish and press flat.
Bake uncovered until golden brown and bubbly at 350 degrees (about 40 min traditionally)
Let potatoes cook slightly before service.
